main.name: Raham Arshad
main.bio: Hello! I'm Raham, a Bachelor of Applied Computer Science student with a minor in management. My education uniquely combines tech skills with business insights. I specialize in web development, proficient in Java, JavaScript, and Python. My portfolio showcases my journey in creating user-friendly, efficient websites. I'm passionate about leveraging my technical expertise and management knowledge to build impactful digital solutions.

education.description: COURSEWORK: Agile Development - Basic Organization of Computer Systems - Data Science - Data Structures & Algorithms - Interdisciplinary Management - Micro organizational Behavior - Object-Oriented Programming - Project Management - Public speaking - Software Development - Software Development Lifecycle (SDLC) - Software Projects - Team Management - Teamwork & Communication - Technical Writing - UI & UX Design - Web Development

work.title: Volunteer
work.description: Joined a collaborative food drive effort, collecting and delivering significant food donations to local food banks, directly aiding in community hunger relief.

work.title: Sports Captain
work.description: Orchestrated training and strategies as a sports coach, steering sports teams to win multiple inter-school tournaments.

work.title: Volunteer
work.description: Organized fundraising and relief efforts during the Covid-19 pandemic, supporting over 400 families.

projects.title: Halifax Explorer
projects.category: An engaging and user-friendly website to facilitate exploration of activities and eateries in Halifax,

projects.title: FLight search
